title: Hilarious Heartseeker Quinn recall bug
body: WTF was that Riot LMAO.  Teemo on the swing BTW.

replies.body: Am I the only one who thinks that this bug is a pretty magnificent recall on its own? Quinn and Valor just swooping back to base...with an eerily empty swing. xD

Hiiii! 

So uh, that's pretty awkward. ;-; I poked around with this, and it appears to be an issue with a reexport of the animation. We've got someone fixing it up. :) Thanks for the report!
Slow motion goodness of our lovely waifu in best skin

> Slow motion goodness of our lovely waifu in best skin

Phoenix Quinn is cuter!

Oh jeez, it's really messed up.

Quinn has certainly seen better days lol.
